search_results.query: lord of the rings hobbits theme

snippet.title: Lego The Lord of the Rings
snippet.description: With neat Lego recreations of the memorable locations, and challenging gameplay, Lego The Lord of the Rings is a lot of fun, if you can get past the awkward controls.

snippet.title: LEGO The Lord of the Rings (Xbox 360)
snippet.description: Exploring a plastic version of Middle-earth is immensely satisfying in Lego The Lord of the Rings.

snippet.title: 'The Lord of the Rings' meets Lego (pictures)
snippet.description: The Lego re-creations of characters and locations from the movie trilogy makes for a fun setting for puzzle-solving gameplay.

snippet.title: One app to rule them all: Lego Lord of the Rings for iOS
snippet.description: The preciousss makes the move from consoles to iPhones and iPads. And it's a steal at $4.99.

snippet.title: 'Lord of the Rings' Lego characters visualized
snippet.description: Lego unveils official "Lord of the Rings" Lego figures, and the brick maker has done an outstanding job re-creating the characters' iconic appearances.

snippet.title: Hobbits, trolls, and elves invade Google Chrome
snippet.description: Indulge your inner Hobbit with the "Journey through Middle-earth" interactive experience from Google. But beware of Hill-trolls!

snippet.title: Lord of the Rings slots land Warner Bros. in legal adventure
snippet.description: A lawsuit filed by the estate of author J.R.R. Tolkien alleges that the studio doesn't have the right to sell Lord of the Rings online games, slot machines, and related items.

snippet.title: Lego Lord of the Rings hands-on
Time-travel, tigers and hobbits in the best tech films of 2012
snippet.description: We run through our favourite films of the year that featured cracking gadgets or boundary-pushing cinema tech.

snippet.title: Lego 'Lord of the Rings' sets astound in hands-on video
snippet.description: Check out CNET UK's closeup look at seven new-to-the-U.K. Lego "Lord of the Rings" sets, complete with Lego Gandalf.
